title:
Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen;
stainless stell and PP material; colors: blue, gray, pink; size: 17x4.5 cm;
descriptions:
### Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen

#### Effortlessly Clear Ice and Frost with Style and Durability!

**Product Highlights:**

- **Material:** Crafted from high-quality **stainless steel** for the blade and **durable PP (polypropylene)** for the handle, ensuring long-lasting performance and resistance to wear and tear.
- **Colors:** Choose from a vibrant selection of **blue, gray, and pink** to match your kitchen decor.
- **Size:** Compact and easy to handle, measuring **17 cm in length by 4.5 cm in width**.
- **Package Includes:** 1 Fridge Ice Scraper
- **Measurement Deviation:** +/- 1-5mm
- **Color Variation Note:** The actual color may vary slightly due to monitor and lighting conditions.

#### Why You’ll Love It:

- **Effortless Ice Removal:** The sharp, stainless steel blade effortlessly cuts through ice and frost, making it a must-have tool for keeping your refrigerator or freezer in top condition.
- **Durable and Reliable:** Built to withstand the rigors of daily use, this ice scraper is designed to last, saving you time and money in the long run.
- **Compact Design:** The sleek and lightweight design makes it easy to store, so you can keep it handy without taking up valuable space.
- **Perfect for Household Use:** Whether you’re defrosting your freezer or cleaning out your fridge, this tool is perfect for all your household needs.

#### Keep Your Kitchen Ice-Free and Looking Great!

Say goodbye to stubborn ice and frost with the Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool. Its combination of style, durability, and functionality makes it an essential addition to any kitchen. Order yours today and enjoy a frost-free, organized, and efficient refrigerator!

**Colors Available:**
- Blue
- Gray
- Pink

**Size:**
- Length: 17 cm
- Width: 4.5 cm

**Order Now and Experience the Difference!**
